events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department for further processing in our recruitment pipeline.
A recruiter has been assigned to your application and will be your point of contact throughout the interview process.
We completed the initial screening of your skills and qualifications and found a strong match to the Software Engineer role.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming availability for the next stage of the technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 8th at 10 AM UTC with our senior engineering team.
You have completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and proficiency in software development.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for May 12th at 3 PM UTC to discuss team fit and company culture.
You successfully completed the HR interview, showing great alignment with our company values and communication style.
We are excited to extend you an offer for the Software Engineer position, including a competitive salary and benefits package.
Thank you for your feedback indicating your enthusiasm for the offer and the opportunity to join our engineering team.
You have accepted our offer, and we are thrilled to welcome you aboard as a new Software Engineer.
Your onboarding process has begun, including access to our systems, meet-and-greet sessions, and training schedules.
The hiring process is now officially closed. Welcome to the team, and we look forward to your contributions.
